translateMethod:
```swift
override func createFragment(at position: Int) -> Fragment {
    switch position {
    case 1:
        fileDetailSharingFragment = FileDetailSharingFragment.newInstance(file: file, user: user)
        return fileDetailSharingFragment
    case 2:
        imageDetailFragment = ImageDetailFragment.newInstance(file: file, user: user)
        return imageDetailFragment
    default:
        fileDetailActivitiesFragment = FileDetailActivitiesFragment.newInstance(file: file, user: user)
        return fileDetailActivitiesFragment
    }
}
```
